page.title: 06A NATIONAL PARK WARDEN
page.content: My name is Robert and my dad is Mr. Lawrence Barker and he has been a National Park Warden for many years.The area in the grid is within{the Yorkshire Dales National } {Park.} He travels about 37 miles a day.His main task is maintenance of the footpath network.The National Park Authority has only minimal control over land but has powers to impose "Tree Preservation Orders" and the protection of endangered species of flowers. With regard to buildings, the National Park is the ultimate planning Authority.My dad likes the continual seasonal change of scenery best about his job.We live in Healaugh in a house that the family has lived in for many generations,and my dad sets out to his work from there every day.He has a van and one person to help him in the area
